title: AI SDK Chat Kernel
description: Settings for the AI SDK Chat Kernel

defaultProvider.title: Default Provider
defaultProvider.description: The AI provider to use. 'built-in-ai' uses Chrome Built-in AI with WebLLM fallback. Other options include openai, anthropic, google, or any custom provider name.

defaultModel.title: Default Model
defaultModel.description: The model to use when the kernel is first initialized. For built-in-ai: use 'prompt-api' for Chrome AI or WebLLM model names. Use %chat list <provider> to see available models.

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: API key for the selected provider (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic, Google). Not needed for 'built-in-ai' provider. The key is stored in browser local storage.
